resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81195</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81195</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Visiting Adventure and Outdoor Education Centres</string>
            <string language="es">Visita de lugares de aventura y de educación al aire libre</string>
            <string language="ga">Cuairt a thabhairt ar Ionaid Eachtraíochta agus Oideachais Allamuigh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besuchsabenteuer und im Freienausbildung Mitten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aventure visitante et centres extérieurs 
d'éducation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aventura visitando e centros ao ar livre da 
instrução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avventura di visita e centri esterni di 
formazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιπέτεια επίσκεψης και υπαίθρια κέντρα εκπαίδευσης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Guidelines for teachers before bringing a class group on a trip to an adventure or outdoor education centre. This includes equipment their class should bring with them and safety standards that should be expected.</string>
            <string language="es">Directrices para los profesores antes de llevar un grupo de clase a una visita a un centro de aventura o de educación al aire libre. Esto incluye el equipo que los alumnos de la clase deberían llevar con ellos y los niveles de seguridad que se deberían es</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoilínte do mhúinteoirí roimh rang a thabhairt ar thuras chuig ionad eachtraíochta nó oideachais allamuigh. Áirítear leis seo an trealamh ar cheart do na daltaí a thabhairt leo agus na caighdeáin sábháilteachta ar cheart súil a bheith leo.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korrekturlinien für Lehrer, bevor eine Kategorie
Gruppe auf einer Reise zu einem Abenteuer oder im Freienzu einer 
ausbildung Mitte geholt wird. Dieses enthält Ausrüstung, die 
ihre Kategorie mit ihnen und Sicherheit Standards holen sollte, die 
erwartet werden sollten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Directives pour des professeurs avant d'apporter 
un groupe de classe en voyage à une aventure ou à un centre 
extérieur d'éducation. Ceci inclut le matériel que leur 
classe devrait apporter avec eux et les normes de sûreté qui 
devraient être prévus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guidelines para professores antes de trazer um 
grupo da classe em um desengate a uma aventura ou a um centro ao ar 
livre da instrução. Isto inclui o equipamento que sua classe 
deve trazer com eles e padrões de segurança que devem se esperar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida di riferimento per gli insegnanti prima di 
portare un gruppo del codice categoria su un viaggio ad un'avventura o
ad un centro esterno di formazione. Ciò include 
l'apparecchiatura che il loro codice categoria dovrebbe portare con 
loro e gli standard di sicurezza che dovrebbero essere previsti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι οδηγίες για τους δασκάλους πρίν φέρνουν μια ομάδα 
κλάσης σχετικά με ένα ταξίδι σε μια περιπέτεια ή μια υπαίθρια 
εκπαίδευση στρέφονται. Αυτό περιλαμβάνει τον εξοπλισμό η 
κλάση που τους πρέπει να φέρει με τους και τα πρότυπα ασφάλειας 
που πρέπει να αναμένονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">9-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>reference</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Gallagher;Sean;
FN:Sean Gallagher
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>974</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

</expression>
